name: BrightID-Node
description: Read and update the anonymous social graph stored on BrightID nodes.

ip.description: IPv4 address of the server hosting this service

publicKey.description: Public key of this server node (base64 encoded)

privateKey.description: Private key of this server node; used for signing verifications (base64 encoded)

ethPrivateKey.description: Ethereum private key of this server node; used for signing verifications (hex representation without 0x)

operationsTimeWindow.description: The time in seconds after which the limits for sending operations will reset

operationsLimit.description: Maximum number of operations each verified user can send in configured time window
